record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. Res. 106
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. Res. 106 -- (House of Representatives - October 16, 2007)

[Page: H11576]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to have my name removed as a cosponsor of House Resolution 106.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Pennsylvania?
